name: Bedroom
description: Create your dream bedroom with our stylish and comfortable furniture collection. From beds to nightstands, we have everything you need to make your bedroom a cozy retreat.

name: Mattress
description: Experience unparalleled comfort and support with our range of high-quality mattresses. Designed to provide a restful night's sleep, our mattresses cater to all sleep preferences.

name: Outdoor
description: Transform your outdoor space into a relaxing oasis with our selection of outdoor furniture. Perfect for patios, gardens, and balconies, our pieces are designed to withstand the elements and look great.

name: Sofa
description: Discover the perfect sofa for your living room with our diverse collection. Whether you prefer modern or classic styles, our sofas offer both comfort and elegance.

name: Living Room
description: Enhance your living room with our stylish and functional furniture. From sofas to coffee tables, we offer a wide range of options to create a space that suits your lifestyle.

name: Kitchen
description: Upgrade your kitchen with our innovative and practical furniture solutions. Our collection includes everything from dining tables to storage cabinets, designed to make your kitchen both beautiful and efficient.
